abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.f4dec946415d8e57]{Aid Your Ally}, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger}, or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.d9208f9b7d827aec]{React Under Fire} by extending interlocking plates as cover for a friend, companion, or ally, add +1 and take +1 momentum. If your action die shows a 1, mark this module as broken.
